We cannot deny that this mathmatics has been endowed as finacial meanings. The first time i know Bitcoin, or furtherly, Encrypted Coin and Block Chains is in 2019 when i was gradulated from senior high. A Tv series called `Sillicon` (Some Nerd change the world...again XD), the writer introduced many cool stuff like 51% attack , equal-encryption and so on.That was the first time i thought "Its gonna be cool". But today, time changes. No more time for my college. I DO REALLY need consider my future, the spirited time is passing away.The finacial value is more and more valuable in Bitcoin. I meantioned the World is being worse. So i need to find a way to keep my money. Typically , There are two ways: Oil and Gold. **Neither i have** So may be encrypted Coin is a better or a more futurable choice. Who knows
